content: st round 6 chain 2 then 1 half_double_crochet in each of the 1st 4 st *2 half_double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 4 st* repeat* until end join with slip_stitch 36 st to make tail stay attached with the slip_stitch from the previous round chain 14 in 2nd chain from hook double_crochet this will make the top of the tail round like a cat would have double_crochet in each of the next 4 st 2 double_crochet in next st then double_crochet in last 7 st 14 st to fully attach the tail to the cat skip the st next to your chain then slip_stitch in the next st and fo to make the feet row 1 count 12 st from where you ended your tail then with a chain connected to your hook pull a loop through and make 1 single_crochet see pics below continue with 3 single_crochet 4 st row 2 chain 1 turn 4 single_crochet 4 st row 3 chain 1 turn 4 single_crochet fo if you prefer a stumpy looking cat like i do if you want a taller cat continue on to the next optional row 4 st row 4 optional chain 1 turn 4 single_crochet fo 4 st to make the next foot go 4 st away from the foot you just finished and follow the exact same process as before row 1 3 or 4 weave in all your ends you can weave in the ends throughout i am lazy and wait until the end now you have an adorable cat butt =
